variables.name: Inlet concentration of A
variables.description: Molar concentration of species A in the feed stream entering the CSTR

variables.name: Concentration of A
variables.description: Steady-state molar concentration of species A within the reactor

variables.name: Concentration of B
variables.description: Steady-state molar concentration of intermediate species B within the reactor

variables.name: Concentration of C
variables.description: Steady-state molar concentration of final product C within the reactor

variables.name: First-order rate constant for A→B
variables.description: Reaction rate constant for the first irreversible first-order reaction converting A to B

variables.name: First-order rate constant for B→C
variables.description: Reaction rate constant for the second irreversible first-order reaction converting B to C

variables.name: Mean residence time
variables.description: Average time a fluid element spends in the reactor (residence time)

variables.name: Reactor volume
variables.description: Total volume of the continuous stirred‐tank reactor

variables.name: Volumetric flow rate
variables.description: Volumetric flow rate of the feed stream into (and effluent stream out of) the reactor

variables.name: Reaction rate of step 1
variables.description: Volumetric rate of formation of species B from A given by r_1 = k_1 C_A

variables.name: Reaction rate of step 2
variables.description: Volumetric rate of formation of species C from B given by r_2 = k_2 C_B
